searchCategory.name: association-to-genomic-segments
searchCategory.description: Search for genes which are associated to genomic segments by eQTL

searchCategory.name: direct-comparison
searchCategory.description: Search for genes which are differentially expressed in a 2 state direct comparison.

searchCategory.name: fold-change
searchCategory.description: Search for genes which are differentially expressed between two sets of samples.

searchCategory.name: fold-change-with-confidence
searchCategory.description: Search for genes which are differentially expressed between 2 samples. PaGE Confidence values for each gene/sample comparison were precomputed using all biological replicates.

searchCategory.name: fold-change-with-fdr
searchCategory.description: Search for genes which are differentially expressed between 2 samples. False Discovery Rates for each gene/sample comparison were precomputed using all biological replicates.

searchCategory.name: fold-change-with-pvalue
searchCategory.description: Search for genes which are differentially expressed between 2 samples. Fishers Exact Test p values for each gene/sample comparison were precomputed.

searchCategory.name: fold-difference
searchCategory.description: Search for genes which are different between two sets of samples.

searchCategory.name: percentile
searchCategory.description: Search for genes based on the rank of expression w/in an experiment.

searchCategory.name: similarity
searchCategory.description: Search for genes which have a similar profile for an experiment.

searchCategory.name: similarity-of-association
searchCategory.description: Search for genes by similarity of association.

searchCategory.name: splice-site-loc
searchCategory.description: Search for genes near experimental splice site locations.
